text: Arianna Schivo (born 16 September 1986) is an Italian Olympic equestrian. She was at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro. She was thirty-fourth place. Schivo also was at the 2015 European Eventing Championships. She was twenty-eighth place. Her father Gian Marco Schivo was in the high jump competition at the 1972 Summer Olympics. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1986 births Category:Event riders Category:Italian equestrians Category:Living people Category:1972 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic equestrians for Italy
title: Arianna Schivo
